radiographic_examinations.findings: Sub-2-mm pulmonary nodules at the lung bases; no pleural effusions; heart normal in size; small sliding hiatal hernia; liver enhances homogeneously; gallbladder partially collapsed; normal pancreas, spleen, and adrenals; kidneys enhance and excrete contrast promptly; no bowel obstruction; appendix enlarged (8-9 mm) with mild wall thickening and hyperemia; no extraluminal fluid collections; prominent lymph nodes in right lower quadrant; unremarkable colon and rectum; normal bladder, uterus, and ovaries; trace physiologic free fluid in pelvis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Appendix has increased in size from prior ultrasound.
